title: Firestorm
description: Will Reyne remain trapped in a life without risk-and a life without love? As a smoke jumper, Reyne Oldre-friend to Rachel Tanner and Beth Morgan (Refuge)-once led a team of courageous firefighters into a blaze that ended in unspeakable tragedy. Now crippled by fear, she conducts fire research from a safe distance, determined not to risk that kind of pain again. But when the flames of love begin to flicker between her and smoke jumper Logan McCabe, Reyne must face the fearsome storms from her past and battle the raging Firestorm that burns in her soul.
author: Lisa Tawn Bergren
